      • getAll

        public java.util.List<Job> getAll()
        Gets all the Jobs from the database
        Returns:

        Returns:
        "inserted" if everything went ok, "updated" if entry already found and just opdated, "error" if there was an expected issue, "exception" if there was an unexpected issue.
